name: Honeycomb Beestro
description:
Buzzy the Bee has always dreamed of owning a successful Restaurant, but it's not going to be easy. Play as Buzzy and help him with his day to day restaurant duties like gathering ingredients, cooking food and serving it to customers. Earn enough money to get to the next day and keep your restaurant afloat.

Leila Le –Secondary Artist and Lead Sprite Artist 

James Gray – Lead Programmer and Composer 

Jenna Zitzman – Lead Artist 

Amber Perkins – Sound Designer 

Brent Sheltz – Secondary Programmer

Lilith Daigneault - Lead Designer
